items.name: var mFileType: AudioFileTypeID
items.desc: A four-character code for the file type (for instance, the kAudioFileAIFFType type.

items.name: var mFormatID: UInt32
items.desc: A four-character code for the format ID such as kAudioFormatLinearPCM, kAudioFormatMPEG4AAC, and so forth. (See the AudioFormat.h header file for declarations.)
